definition: in a nutshell/to put it briefly
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: In short, reverie is a factor of the mother"s alpha-function."
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，沉思是母亲阿尔法功能的一个因素。

sentences.english: The short answer is: because of the special mathematical properties of keygen.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之就是那个keygen使用的数学原理。

sentences.english: In short, his good-luck charms seem to be working.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，他的幸运护身符看来起作用了。

sentences.english: In short. I did all; the things that I was specially asked not to do.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，我做了一切福兰克不让我做的事。

sentences.english: In short, drugs like modafinil make revision seem fun.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，像莫达非尼这样的药物让复习变得有趣。

sentences.english: In short local Hong Kong people are sneaky VERY sneaky.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，香港本地人很狡猾。

sentences.english: In short, we need to reinvent the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，我们需要彻底改造马桶。

sentences.english: That, in short, is the charge sheet against the industry.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，这是对该行业开出的问罪单。

sentences.english: To be concise, this means that he stands up from his tax post and follows Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，这意味著离开他的税关，去跟随耶稣。

sentences.english: In short, order had been restored to La Liga. At least for now.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，西甲的秩序目前是恢复了。

sentences.english: In brief, use exceptions properly and never return error codes.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，合理使用异常，切勿返回错误代码。

sentences.english: In short, I can’t help feeling that the gold bugs are right.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，我会情不自禁地觉得黄金信徒们是正确的。

sentences.english: Put simply, corporations cannot be embarrassed because they do not have emotions.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，公司不能感到尴尬是因为它们没有情感。

sentences.english: In short, physical books can't compete with other print media for advertisers.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，纸质书不能同其他平面媒体竞争广告客户。

sentences.english: Simply put, women are behaving as if fathers are optional.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，妇女们的举止说明了好像父亲是可选的。

sentences.english: In short, listen to your inner child. Become a kid again.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，听从你的童心，重新作回一个孩子。

definition: in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
one word says it all (idiom, from Analects); to cut a long story short/in a nutshell
